prop.name: openingHours
prop.desc:
The general opening hours for a business. Opening hours can be specified as a weekly time range, starting with days, then times per day. Multiple days can be listed with commas ',' separating each day. Day or time ranges are specified using a hyphen '-'.

  • Days are specified using the following two-letter combinations: Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa, Su.
  • Times are specified using 24:00 time. For example, 3pm is specified as 15:00.
  • Here is an example: <time itemprop="openingHours" datetime="Tu,Th 16:00-20:00">Tuesdays and Thursdays 4-8pm</time>.
  • If a business is open 7 days a week, then it can be specified as <time itemprop="openingHours" datetime="Mo-Su">Monday through Sunday, all day</time>.

Place.name: photo
Place.desc: A photograph of this place.

Place.name: openingHoursSpecification
Place.desc: The opening hours of a certain place.

Place.name: events
Place.desc: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.

Place.name: smokingAllowed
Place.desc: Indicates whether it is allowed to smoke in the place, e.g. in the restaurant, hotel or hotel room.

Place.name: globalLocationNumber
Place.desc: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

Place.name: maximumAttendeeCapacity
Place.desc: The total number of individuals that may attend an event or venue.

Place.name: reviews
Place.desc: Review of the item.

Place.name: aggregateRating
Place.desc: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

Place.name: photos
Place.desc: Photographs of this place.

Place.name: map
Place.desc: A URL to a map of the place.

Place.name: branchCode
Place.desc:
A short textual code (also called "store code") that uniquely identifies a place of business. The code is typically assigned by the parentOrganization and used in structured URLs.

For example, in the URL http://www.starbucks.co.uk/store-locator/etc/detail/3047 the code "3047" is a branchCode for a particular branch.

Place.name: hasMap
Place.desc: A URL to a map of the place.

Place.name: additionalProperty
Place.desc:
A property-value pair representing an additional characteristics of the entitity, e.g. a product feature or another characteristic for which there is no matching property in schema.org.

Note: Publishers should be aware that applications designed to use specific schema.org properties (e.g. http://schema.org/width, http://schema.org/color, http://schema.org/gtin13, ...) will typically expect such data to be provided using those properties, rather than using the generic property/value mechanism.

Place.name: address
Place.desc: Physical address of the item.

Place.name: specialOpeningHoursSpecification
Place.desc:
The special opening hours of a certain place.

Use this to explicitly override general opening hours brought in scope by openingHoursSpecification or openingHours.

Place.name: amenityFeature
Place.desc: An amenity feature (e.g. a characteristic or service) of the Accommodation. This generic property does not make a statement about whether the feature is included in an offer for the main accommodation or available at extra costs.

Place.name: logo
Place.desc: An associated logo.

Place.name: telephone
Place.desc: The telephone number.

Place.name: geo
Place.desc: The geo coordinates of the place.

Place.name: containedInPlace
Place.desc: The basic containment relation between a place and one that contains it.

Place.name: review
Place.desc: A review of the item.

Place.name: publicAccess
Place.desc: A flag to signal that the Place is open to public visitors. If this property is omitted there is no assumed default boolean value

Place.name: event
Place.desc: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.

Place.name: containsPlace
Place.desc: The basic containment relation between a place and another that it contains.

Place.name: isicV4
Place.desc: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

Place.name: maps
Place.desc: A URL to a map of the place.

Place.name: faxNumber
Place.desc: The fax number.

Place.name: isAccessibleForFree
Place.desc: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.

Place.name: containedIn
Place.desc: The basic containment relation between a place and one that contains it.
